channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel strikes in Damascus as Syrian forces clash with Druze groups
item.description: The strike came as clashes continued in the southern Syrian city of Sweida after a ceasefire between government forces and Druze armed groups collapse...

item.title: In praise of the humble recorder — a gateway instrument for millions of schoolchildren
item.description: The small plastic instrument has long been the go-to instrument in elementary schools. But it is capable of so much more than "Hot Cross Buns."

item.title: Supreme Court Keeps Ruling in Trump’s Favor, but Doesn’t Say Why
item.description: In a series of terse, unsigned orders, the court has often been giving the green light to President Trump’s agenda without a murmur of explanation.

item.title: Public Media Can Be a Lifeline. Gutting It Hurts Everyone.
item.description: Abandoning local public radio and TV would accelerate a dangerous trend straining civic health.

item.title: Y'all, we need to talk about 'y'all'
item.description: The word fills an important gap in our language, but it was once stigmatized. The story of "y'all" also includes powerful cultural forces, from hip-ho...

item.title: As Iran Deports a Million Afghans, ‘Where Do We Even Go?’
item.description: Afghans being forced out of Iran are grappling with an uncertain future in Afghanistan, where widespread poverty and severe restrictions on women and ...

item.title: Rising Inflation, and the Supreme Court’s ‘Shadow Docket’
item.description: Plus, why that e-book cost your library $50.

item.title: Even healthy brains decline with age. Here's what you can do
item.description: Scientists are finding ways to minimize the effects of aging on the brain. Here are some ways to keep it healthy.

item.title: Adelita Grijalva wins Arizona Democratic primary for late father's seat in Congress
item.description: Adelita Grijalva has won the Democratic nomination for a congressional district in Arizona held by her father, the late Rep. Raúl Grijalva, who held t...

item.title: Afghan Women and Girls Deported From Iran Fear Returning to Afghanistan
item.description: “Get ready to cope” was the message from an aid worker to women returning to Taliban rule in Afghanistan after their expulsion from Iran.

item.title: Migration Fears Turn Europe’s Borderless Dreams Into Traffic Nightmares
item.description: Germany’s new government imposed border checks to demonstrate toughness on migration, though crossings started slowing years ago.

item.title: What to Know About the Fighting in Southern Syria
item.description: Druse militiamen have been fighting with Bedouins in the Sweida Province, and Syrian government forces and the Israeli military are getting involved.

item.title: Why So Many Afghans Have Been Forced Out of Iran

item.description: “Get ready to cope” was the message from an aid worker to women returning to Taliban rule in Afghanistan after their expulsion from Iran.
